page.title: 07THE FLOWER SHOW
page.content: They hold one flower show a year. The chairman does the work as a hobbie.He goes to compare and to get ideas.They hold five different classes,sometimes they get failures Otherwise they are ok. There are fifty people interested in it. 110 people went to the last flower show.25% of the people go to different shows.They raised Â£ 70 pounds last show which went to charities or to raise the hall.Fundraising is used alot in North Cheriton ,as it is a charitable village.The shows are held in August or September.Serious Spring shows are held.They auction the produce left over after the show has finished.Â£50 went to the Wincanton Memorial Hospital and Â£50 went to the fundraising for this year's show.The show is for entertainment and fun but it is also part of the village life.
